pullrequest.title: Joint control menu read current values

content.html:
here's the patch I used to cause the problems:

diff -r 0cbfd42477cd gazebo/physics/JointController.cc
--- a/gazebo/physics/JointController.cc Mon Jul 03 10:28:59 2017 -0700
+++ b/gazebo/physics/JointController.cc Mon Jul 03 18:09:57 2017 -0700
@@ -250,6 +250,7 @@
         this->dataPtr->velPids[jointName].GetIGain());
   }

+  common::Time::MSleep(1000);
   _result = true;
 }
